snippet.title: Echelon 2D by Eageron® (Official iOS/Android Trailer)
snippet.description:
Echelon 2D is now AVAILABLE for FREE on iOS and ANDROID
★ ECHELON (iOS): https://itunes.apple.com/app/apple-store/id1122415670?pt=118268641&ct=youtube&mt=8
★ ECHELON (Android): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Eageron.Apps.Echelon

Description:

A hail of ballistic missiles attack you wave after wave. Shoot them down and protect your shields, but be careful because for every wave you have a limited amount of rockets! Use your rockets wisely and try to aim perfectly to trigger chain reactions! 

Train to improve your skills and break through the top of the leaderboard. Show off and share your highscore with your friends.

How long can you survive?

Echelon 2D - Features: 

• Strictly a skill game!
• Completely free to play
• Game Center leaderboard / Google Play Games leaderboard
• Retro, clean and minimalistic design
• Simple and intuitive one tap controls
• Procedural wave creation
• 6 epic soundtracks

★ SUBSCRIBE FOR MORE MOBILE GAMES 
►http://youtube.com/c/+EageronINT

★ Follow us on Facebook: ► http://facebook.com/eageronINT
★ Follow us on Twitter: ► http://twitter.com/EageronEN
★ Follow us on Gplus: ► https://plus.google.com/+EageronINT/about
★ Visit our Website: ► http://eageron.com
